# Vayu

Vayu is a visualization tool for environmental data in Python. It can be helpful for data exploration and post analysis of results.

## Installation

Stable version can be installed from PyPI using pip:

```bash
pip install vayu
```

To install the latest version from GitHub, use:

```bash
pip install git+https://github.com/sustainability-lab/vayu.git
```
